title: Emerald and Ruby Nakshi Pendant Haaram - Panchala Collection
materials: Polki Diamonds. Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases alternating oval-cut emeralds secured with meticulously crafted Polki diamond floral accents. The intricate Nakshi work in the gold settings adds a touch of traditional elegance. The centerpiece is a teardrop-shaped ruby pendant surrounded by Polki diamonds, creating a mesmerizing focal point.
colors: and the sparkling white of the Polki diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivahaalu)
and upscale gala events. An excellent choice for the modern bride seeking a blend of tradition and sophistication.
description: A captivating blend of traditional South Indian artistry and modern design. The natural emeralds and ruby are of exceptional quality, promising enduring beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a radiant and long-lasting finish. Makes a statement and celebrates the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. A treasured heirloom piece.
